I rang him again. "Well I thought maybe I should be the first to say hello to you." He began to laugh and told me, "My name is Adolf Meth. I'm 88 years old and I haven't had so many wrong numbers in one day in 20 years" We both _ . We talked for ten minutes. Adolf had no family, no friends, just like me.
